CheckTitle: Log monitoring and alerts are set up for Cloud Firewall changes
Description: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for Cloud Firewall rule changes.
Risk: Monitoring for Create or Update firewall rule events gives insight network access changes and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to SLS Console. Ensure the Action Trail are Enabled. Select Alerts. Ensure alert rule has been enabled for Cloud Firewall changes.
